subject: Re: Order #SSN2081 confirmed
description_text:

I ordered the following items on 21 July 2025, but I noticed that the items have not been shipped. May I know when the order will be shipped?

Thank you!

conversations.body_text:
Hi Simsonn,

I am not able to open the ticket, I am unable to sign up for the help desk.

May I know if there are any updates to the shipment of order SSN2081?

Hi Benedict Dylan,    I have confirmed with our warehouse staff that these two elastomers are out of stock and have not been shipped. We can replace them with the new elastomers or issue a refund. Please confirm.

Hi Simsonn,

In that case, I would like to have the refund, thank you.
Hi Benedict Dylan,    Okay, we have refunded your money. We apologize for not updating your shipping information in a timely manner!
